name: Domo Arigato (Mezcal and Ginger Cocktail)
description: If you’ve never made cocktails with mezcal, this is a great place to start. It’s become my dinner party favorite.
recipeIngredient: 1/4 ounce plus 1 teaspoon (13ml) fresh ginger juice

recipeInstructions.text: In a cocktail shaker, combine mezcal, simple syrup, lime juice, ginger juice, and sesame oil in a cocktail shaker and fill with ice. Shake until well chilled, about 15 seconds. Unseal shaker and add club soda. Strain into an ice-filled collins glass.
